children.name: Revenue Growth
children.question: Has the company demonstrated a minimum annual revenue growth rate of 20% over the past three years?

children.name: Profit Margins
children.question: Does the company maintain a net profit margin of at least 10%?

children.name: Cash Flow
children.question: Is the operating cash flow consistently positive over the past three years?

children.name: Debt Levels
children.question: Is the debt-to-equity ratio less than 2:1, and does the interest coverage ratio exceed 3:1?

children.name: Market Share
children.question: Does the company hold a top 3 market share position in its industry?

children.name: Unique Value Proposition
children.question: Does the company have at least one significant competitive advantage (e.g., proprietary technology, patents, or strong brand)?

children.name: Barriers to Entry
children.question: Are the industry’s barriers to entry high enough to protect the company’s market position?

children.name: Leadership Experience
children.question: Does the management team have a proven track record with at least 10 years of relevant industry experience?

children.name: Board Composition
children.question: Does the board include at least two independent directors with relevant expertise?

children.name: Product Portfolio
children.question: Does the company offer a diversified product portfolio with at least three distinct revenue-generating products or services?

children.name: R&D Investment
children.question: Has the company consistently invested at least 5% of its revenue in R&D over the past three years?

children.name: Product Roadmap
children.question: Does the company have a clear product roadmap with planned launches for the next two years?

children.name: Industry Trends
children.question: Is the company operating in an industry expected to grow at least 10% annually over the next five years?

children.name: Regulatory Environment
children.question: Is the regulatory environment stable and favorable for the company’s operations?
